title: "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again."
body: Earlier today i was starting a ranked game when the game launched, sudden crash. when i tried to log back in it then told me incorrect username and password. i then went to the website and changed my password. now when i try and log in to the game it is constantly giving me the same message as the subject. Please help.

replies.body: Today, I just found out to have a similar problem, I just want to mention it and say that when i tried logging into my EUNE account, that message showed and said that an unexpected error had occured while logging in and that i should try again. Well I did, in fact a lot of times, but then i tried checking out if something was wrong with the server so i checked the server status but nothing seemed to be going wrong with that.Then i swapped to the EUW server to try logging into another account of mine and i successfully did. It seems like i cant find a way to connect to my EUNE account for 2 days now , not knowing what else to do. I've typed my password and username too many times , restarted my pc too, but it is fairly obvious that the message will never leave :( . Please help...
Has there been an update on this? I am currently having the same issues after going through the entire guide.

The incorrect username might be due to a patch mis-match, but restarting the client should fix that up.  The unexpected error sounds like a network problem reaching the game server, though.  You should go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear up any blocks.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I've gone through the whole connection issues guide and the client still isn't working.

Thanks for the update, though something else might be causing a block to our services.  At this point, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some context logs and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will get back to you and find some more options for your specific case.  Hang tight!
